entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:53 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
